## VectorBuilder.ones() method

Constructs a vector of all ones

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ones(dimension: number): V;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dimension | number | The dimension of the new vector |

<b>Returns:</b>

V

The new vector

## Example


```
vectorBuilder.ones(3); // [ 1 1 1 ]

```
